title: Leak of Draft SCOTUS Abortion Decision Is Stunning
itunes:title: Leak of Draft SCOTUS Abortion Decision Is Stunning
description:
Adam Winkler, a professor at UCLA Law School, discusses the unprecedented leak of a draft Supreme Court opinion that overturns the constitutional right to abortion.

Harry Nelson, the founder of Nelson Hardiman, discusses San Francisco's landmark trial against the opioid industry.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
